title: Cuttlefish bolognaise
description: If you are looking to do something a bit different with seafood then this cuttlefish bolognaise is just the trick.
ingredients: 3 cuttlefish, body, tentacles and wings separated, tentacle and wings finely chopped, to yield 500g/1lb 2oz
25g/1oz flatleaf parsley, finely chopped, plus 1 tbsp to serve
